Dear CS,

I would like to express my compliment to the ParknShop team of their professional and excellent services even under the chaotic situation, covering all locations in HK, though I read the news some web users are complaining why the delivery team went to CUHK. As a political neutral company like ParknShop, it provides quality products and services to all walks of life regardless of any stance. My family, friends and I myself would definitely continue shopping at Parknshop, which no other supermarket can provide me with the same shopping experience.

A loyal customer
Xxxx

Send å»
ParknshopCS@asw.com.hk

Dear CS,

I would like to express my compliment to the ParknShop team of their professional and excellent services even under the chaotic situation, covering all locations in HK, though I read the news some web users are complaining why the delivery team went to CUHK. As a political neutral company like ParknShop, it provides quality products and services to all walks of life regardless of any stance. My family, friends and I myself would definitely continue shopping at Parknshop, which no other supermarket can provide me with the same shopping experience.

A loyal customer
Xxxx

Send å»
ParknshopCS@asw.com.hk
